chunk:
Common Heir 10% Vitamin C Serum

Brand: Common Heir

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Isoamyl Laurate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, C13-15 Alkane, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Althaea Officinalis Root

Glycol Diheptanoate, C13-15 Alkane, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil

Directions: Squeeze and twist one capsule. Gently massage onto clean face and neck before moisturizing. Use daily (AM or PM).

Warnings: For external use only. Store at room temperature.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions
